title._content: ["The Dunes," Frank Bestow Wiborg house, Highway Behind the Pond, East Hampton, New York. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["The Dunes," Frank Bestow Wiborg house, Highway Behind the Pond, East Hampton, New York. Lily pool] [ca. 1915] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture: Grosvenor Atterbury, 1895. Associated Name: Adleine Sherman (Mrs. Frank Bestow) Wiborg. Other: The house was on 600 acres between Hook Pond and the Atlantic Ocean. Today: House and garden not extant. On slide (handwritten): "W" and "Wiborg." Photographed when Frances Benjamin Johnston and Mattie Edwards Hewitt worked together. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Gardens--New York (State)--East Hampton--1910-1920. Lily ponds--New York (State)--East Hampton--1910-1920. Flowers--New York (State)--East Hampton--1910-1920. Format: Lantern slides--Hand-colored--1910-1920. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16225 Call Number: LC-J717-X100- 16
